content: the morgan ear warmer pattern is super easy to crochet and works up quickly you can make a couple headbands in only an hour or two this beginner friendly ear warmer headband crochet pattern is available in sizes child teen and adult with notes to downsize to toddler 12 mos - 24 mos and small child 3-5 years additional sizing options are included in the notes section of my pattern post and the stitch multiple is also provided the finished fabric has a soft striped texture this warm and cozy wearable makes a great gift if you are using the same yarn as i used you can make 2 teen-sized or smaller headbands with 1 ball of yarn **finished project yardage ** child 1 54 oz 44 g and 53 yds 48 m teen 1 57 oz 45 g and 54 yds 49 m adult 1 82 oz 52 g and 62 yds 57 m **yarn colors ** child cobblestone teen peninsula and adult amethyst ♥ rhondda **instagram ** https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ **pinterest ** https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesign/ **youtube ** https //www youtube com/c/oombawkadesigncrochet sub_confirmation=1 **facebook ** https //www facebook com/oombawkadesign/ **newsletter ** https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter #oombawka @oombawkadesigncrochet #odcmakers © 2021 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
